originalText.text: If I could give 10 stars I would! Crystal has been doing my hair for over 10 years. I moved upstate and still come to the city just for her. I trust her and know she’ll always provide high quality service and her beautiful, kind energy. Every time I leave I feel like I got an upgrade! Doing hair is her craft, she’s a true professional. Highly recommend!

text.text: If I could give 10 stars I would! Crystal has been doing my hair for over 10 years. I moved upstate and still come to the city just for her. originalText.text: Before starting this process I was extremely nervous and skeptical of the results because I wasn’t sure how it would turn out in person, but after the first session with Crystal I was EXTREMELY happy with where my results were going. Crystal listened to my concerns I had in the beginning and out did my expectations and I’m truly grateful for her. Each session built upon the previous to truly give you the look you desire. Not to mention, her work is extremely clean and detailed, she's very professional, responds in a timely matter, and works well around your schedule to accommodate you. Crystal will make sure you’re a satisfied customer! Think of it as a collaboration lol I HIGHLY recommend you visit her you wont’t be disappointed I promise.
